title: The ‘strongest currency on earth’ just hit an 11-year high — and it’s stirring up trouble in Switzerland
summary_full: The Swiss franc is widely viewed as a safe haven asset, rising in value in times of geopolitical or macroeconomic uncertainty.
summary_public: The Swiss franc is widely viewed as a safe haven asset, rising in value in times of geopolitical or macroeconomic uncertainty.
